nodes.text: Miza was a Chiss who was part of the squadron that supported Jagged Fel's mission to the New Republic, shortly before the Battle of Yuuzhan'tar.
He joined the Twin Suns Squadron and piloted a Nssis-class Clawcraft. He was killed when a Yevethan pilot set his ship to self-destruct, and Miza's craft was caught in the blast.
